plot: How do you make a community garden? In The People's Plot, a group of gardeners in West Leederville tell us what it takes and share the fruits of their labour. Spend some time in the garden with us. You won't go away empty handed.
title: The People's Plot
plot_es: How do you make a community garden? In The People's Plot, a group of gardeners in West Leederville tell us what it takes and share the fruits of their labour. Spend some time in the garden with us. You won't go away empty handed.
